info: Base set of SCPI commands supported by all instruments

*CLS.help: Clear Status - Clears the Standard Event Register, Operation Event Register, Questionable Event Register, and Error Queue

*ESE.help: Event Enable - Programs the Standard Event Status Enable register bits (0 to 255)

*ESR.help: Query the Standard Event Status Event register. Reading the register clears it

*IDN.help: Identification query - Returns manufacturer, model, serial number, and firmware version

*OPC.help: Operation Complete - Sets OPC bit when all pending operations are complete

*RST.help: Reset - Resets the electronic load to factory-defined states

*SRE.help: Service Request Enable - Sets the Service Request Enable Register (0 to 255)

*STB.help: Status Byte query - Reads the Status Byte register

*TST.help: Self-test query - Returns 0 if passed, non-zero error code if failed
